name: Shade Threes
description:
Featured in the UK and US, join the 1000's already playing Shade Threes. The game where you shade the grey tiles with the same numbers to make one black tile, and of course try and get the high score!

How to Play: Swipe to move all tiles. When three tiles with the same colour or numbers touch, they merge into one. It's all over when the board fills up.

Sounds easy, right?

-------------------------------

Shade Threes features:

Easy and fun to play
Addictive and impossible
Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
